item.title: Tri-ing for Imperial at BUCS championship
item.author: Stephen Cooper,
item.description: A 6-strong team from TriIC donned their lycra (or to be precise a pleasant Nylon-Spandex mix) to compete in the 340-strong field of May’s BUCS sprint triathlon championship. Arriving at the sunny Wiltshire in the morning, avoiding the wealth of carbon time trial bikes in the car park, the task of …
